Theme-based Defaults

Each theme may optionally override the settings in defaults.ini with its own "defaults" file. This file is located at display/themes/<theme>/theme.ini off of tmda-cgi's root directory. No error will be reported if this file does not exist.

The format and variables supported is identical to that of the defaults.ini file. theme.ini may not override any variables in the [NoOverride] section. Additional variables allowed in theme.ini are:

Theme:Info

Theme:Info

General information on the theme.

Example:
[Theme]
Info = &copy;2003 Graham Chapman, all rights reserved.
